content.title: Add Custom Events to the Component
content.body:
1. From the upper-left corner of Iris, in the Templates explorer, expand Components and select the component userEntry.emailField.
  2. From the upper-right corner of Iris, in the Properties panel, click Action, and then, click Manage Events.
  3. From the Manage Events window, select the Custom tab, and then click the Add icon .
  4. Under Raised Events, enter onValidationSuccess.
  5. Click the Add icon again. Under Raised Events, enter onValidationFailed.
  6. Click Apply.
